name: Atlas
text: Villainous. Victory 1. [star] Atlas gets +2 hit points for each growth counter on him. Forced Response: After the villain phase ends, place 1 growth counter on Atlas.

name: Grow Invulnerable
text: When Revealed: Place 1 additional threat here for each growth counter on Atlas. If Atlas has 10 or more growth counters on him, the players lose the game.

name: Growing Strong
text:
When Revealed: Find Atlas and reveal him. (If he is already in play, he engages you.) Atlas activates against you. If no enemy activated this way, this card gains surge.
[star] Boost: Give the activating enemy a tough status card.
